EmailTemplate.subject: REMINDER: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE NOTICE â€“ TriTech.com ePCR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> REMINDER: SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE NOTICE TriTech.com ePCR (formally Fusion Online ePCR) Server Migration
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=TriTech.com ePCR Customer}}, On Sunday, October 7 at 12AM CDT (1AM EDT, 10PM PDT), TriTech will be performing scheduled maintenance on the TriTech.com Servers. During the maintenance period, TriTech.com ePCR LAN Clients will be unavailable; also you will be unable to Datalink your TriTech.com ePCR Mobile (D-Con) Clients. You may continue to use your TriTech.com ePCR Mobile Clients, with the exception of the Datalink process. This maintenance is scheduled to be completed by Monday, October 8 at 6AM CDT (7AM EDT, 4AM PDT).
On Monday, October 8 when access to TriTech.com ePCR is available, please use the following NEW web address online.tritech.com <https://online.tritech.com/> to connect to your TriTech.com ePCR LAN Clients. Please note, at this time your TriTech.com ePCR Mobile Clients will need to be reconfigured to Datalink with the new server. This reconfiguration will be done using the TriTech Thumb Drive you received in the mail.
Please be sure to communicate the NEW (online.tritech.com <online.tritech.com>) web address to any staff member who accesses TriTech.com ePCR LAN Clients, as of Sunday, October 7 at 12AM CDT (1AM EDT, 10PM PDT), the web address they currently use will no longer be available.
In the event you are unable to connect to your TriTech.com ePCR System or if you have questions please contact your Client Account Manager or TriTech Support Services.
TriTech.com Product Team TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com Support: (563) 387-9338 | email: emssupport@tritech.com <mailto:emssupport@tritech.com>
